name: Pixelmon Trainer Craft: Catch & Battle
description:
Hi, trainer! If you like adventures, pocket monsters, exciting battles, craft and fun, then welcome to us in the mysterious and beautiful world of pixelmon! Here you can find yourself friends - pocket creatures - pixelmons, build your house with special blocks, become the best! Improve! Evolve! Take care of your pixelmon, use special balls to catch a pixelmon, improve their skills and become the best trainer of our mysterious world. Fight with other coaches, find out the abilities of each pixelmon and choose the most suitable one for you. Do not forget to follow your opponent and use your abilities on time, this is the task of the trainer! There are many different types of pixelmon in our world, each of which has 3 evolutions. In our world, new skins of characters, new types of pixelmon regularly appear! Soon multiplayer will appear and you will be able to fight with your friends in the wonderful world of battles and adventures :)

Have fun!:)
